songs.title: A Ghost
songs.lyrics:
They're calling you
Some kind of ghost
But I know that's not true

Cause time and time again I spoke
And I have spoke with you

They're saying I
Am some kind of ghost
But that's so hard to say

Maybe I'll go
Maybe you're safe
No there's no way to say

And I would love you
To come over
And I would love you to
